failures.failureDetail: Expected: a string starting with "<ows:Exception"      but: was "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ows:ExceptionReport xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" version="1.0.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/ows http://localhost:8080/geoserver/schemas/ows/1.0.0/owsExceptionReport.xsd"> <ows:Exception exceptionCode="NoApplicableCode"> <ows:ExceptionText>Whoops, something gone wrong!</ows:ExceptionText> </ows:Exception> </ows:ExceptionReport> "
